title: Relentless: A Striker Mystery Novel
description: A crime like this town has never experienced.A criminal that may be hiding amongst them.Life is good for Striker. He's a detective by day, has a solid relationship with his beautiful girlfriend, and earns extra cash by training police around the country on responding to domestic violence. His expertise gets him reassigned - whether he wants it or not - to be the head of a new unit. Before he has a chance to get acquainted with his partner, a high profile news reporter goes missing and his unit is called into action. He soon finds himself smack dab in the middle of the biggest case the beautiful, bustling City of Duluth, Minnesota has ever seen.
author: Marcus Bruning
